ARABIC: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكْرًا وَمَكَرْنَا مَكْرًا وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They hatched a plot and We hatched a plot while they were not aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They hatched up the plot; We also planned without their knowledge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thus they planned and We too planned, the while they did not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They plotted and We planned without their knowledge. Consider the result of their plot.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So they devised a scheme, and We made our secret plan, and they remained neglectful.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, they plotted a plot, and We planned a plan, while they perceived not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they planned a plan, and We planned a plan while they perceived not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And they devised a device, and We likewise devised a device, while they were not aware;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So they plotted a plot: and We plotted a plot, while they perceived not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Thus they devised a plan, and We also devised a plan, but they were not aware of it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they plotted a plot, and We plotted a plot, while they perceived it not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They devised a plot, and We [too] devised a plan, but they were not aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They plotted and planned, but We too planned, even while they perceived it not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So they plotted a plot, and We planned a plan, while they perceived not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: And they devised a scheme and, without their knowledge, We devised a scheme.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They planned a plan, and We planned a plan, but they did not notice.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they planned a plan, and We planned a plan, while they perceived not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [27:50] So they plotted, thereby, a plot, but We [also] plotted a plot, in other words, We requited them by hastening on their punishment, while they were not aware.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So they plotted a plot) they planned to kill Salih and all those who believed with him: (and We plotted a plot) and We wanted to kill them, (while they perceived not) Our plotting; it is also said that this means: the angels killed them in the house of Salih by hailing stones at them without them perceiving it.
